message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[24-Apr-2025 03:59:34 UTC] WordPress database error

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS wp_pdckl_links ( id int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, id_post int(18) NOT NULL, time int(10) NOT NULL, link text NOT NULL, active tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) )

Queries made or created this session were:

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
  2. Executing: ROLLBACK | (no parameters)
